in public housing was very viciously and
sadistically attacked by a group of
police officers they broke down the door
to her home they assaulted her
physically and sexually they humiliated
her in front of family members they did
it without a warrant and they did it
with complete impunity these officers
were well known
to the residents of public housing they
weren't strangers they were informally
called the skull cap crew and they were
known further their incredibly abusive
tendencies towards the residents of
public housing Diane bond new Jamie and
she told him what had happened to her he
